plot: John Oliver discusses the systems in place for donating our organs and bodies, why those donations don't always go where we might think they're going, and which airline is the Greyhound bus of the sky.

John Oliver talks about the weak mechanisms of donating our organs and bodies in United States of America and how the donors' bodies sometime does not server the purpose it was intended for. Surpringly Trump administration really worked to improve the condition.—Niaz Islam Arif
